title: Several Save the Date cards title script
author: sirland

comments.content: Looks handwritten: /a, /e and /t are different shapes when duplicated.

With contextual alternates and stylistic sets, a typeface can approximate the variability of a hand-drawn script. While I didn't find a match to your sample, the fonts below may be decent alternatives:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/trial-by-cupcakes/quickpen/regular/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/trial-by-cupcakes/quickpen/regular/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/trial-by-cupcakes/quickpen/regular/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/magpiepaperworks/ondise/regular/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/magpiepaperworks/ondise/regular/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/magpiepaperworks/ondise/regular/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/magpiepaperworks/dasha/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/magpiepaperworks/dasha/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/magpiepaperworks/dasha/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/peoni-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/peoni-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/emily-lime/peoni-pro/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/adorn/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/adorn/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/adorn/") (turn on Stylistic Sets)

Unfortunately, can't state if it's hand-drawn or typeset using many alternates. But to follow Kevin's great suggestions, I suggest not stopping to each individual font but having also a look to their corresponding foundries: [Trial by Cupcakes](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145121/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Trial_by_Cupcakes/), [Magpie Paper Works](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145121/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Magpie_Paper_Works), [Emily Lime](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145121/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Emily_Lime), [Laura Worthington](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145121/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Laura_Worthington) plus **[Debi Sementelli](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145121/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Debi_Sementelli_Type_Foundry), [Great Lakes Lettering](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145121/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Great_Lakes_Lettering) and [Eurotypo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145121/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Eurotypo)**
